summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle, in the sum of Five Hundred Fifty-seven and 31/100 Dollars ($557.31), on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of Fifth Avenue and Vine Street by paving the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 21735, creating Local Improvement District No. 2176.
